name: OZ Minerals Limited
description: OZ Minerals Limited is a leading Australian mining company that specializes in the production of copper and gold. Founded in 2008 and headquartered in Adelaide, South Australia, OZ Minerals operates several mines and has a strong focus on sustainability and innovation in mining practices. The company is recognized for its commitment to responsible mining, utilizing advanced technologies to limit environmental impact and enhance operational efficiency. OZ Minerals operates the Carrapateena and Prominent Hill mines, both of which are significant contributors to its production capacity. The company also has a robust pipeline of exploration projects aimed at discovering new resources. OZ Minerals is dedicated to engaging with local communities and stakeholders, ensuring that its operations benefit the regions in which it operates. With a strong emphasis on safety, sustainability, and community engagement, OZ Minerals strives to be a leader in the mining sector while contributing to the global demand for critical minerals.
